definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Peer review will need to be peer pressure.
sentences.chinese: 同侪评审需要深化为同侪压力。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要进一步增进友谊，加深理解，深化双方合作。

sentences.english: Furthermore, little effort has been devoted to the investigation of the function of fictive motion.
sentences.chinese: 另外，对虚拟运动作用的研究也没有继续深化。

sentences.english: Effective measures should be taken to expand and streng…
sentences.chinese: 山东应该采取有效措施扩大和深化对韩贸易。

sentences.english: Continue to deepen reform of rural collective forest right system reform in full.
sentences.chinese: 农村综合改革继续深化，集体林权制度改革全面推开。

sentences.english: The final solution should be the deepening reform and improved efficiency of the state-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业的深化及效率的提高才是本。

sentences.english: Deepen the culture of responsibility-building, to maintain harmonious and stable mining areas.
sentences.chinese: 深化责任文化建设，全力维护矿区和谐稳定。

sentences.english: Their sense of solidarity is deepened by the loneliness of being in a foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 他们的团结意识由于深处异国他乡而更加深化了。

sentences.english: We must strengthen the reform, and enhance the construction of the training system for non-Party representatives.
sentences.chinese: 深化改革，加强党外代表人士教育培训的体系建设。

sentences.english: And "change" refers to unleashing staff potential through deepening reform.
sentences.chinese: 改，就是通过深化改革推动机构编制释放潜力。

sentences.english: They are willing to continue to deepen the bilateral and multilateral cooperation for mutual benefit.
sentences.chinese: 愿不断深化双边与多边合作，实现互利双赢多赢。

sentences.english: They also saw the need to explore new options for energizing the rebound.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到了为深化经济复苏探索新方法的需要。

sentences.english: We will deepen the reform of thescienceand technologymanagementsystem.
Hu said that we hope to further strengthen Sino-Malaysian cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，希望在新形势下进一步深化中马合作。

sentences.english: The article also said the DPRK is vowing to strengthen its nuclear deterrence for the future.
sentences.chinese: 文章同时指出朝鲜坚持未来会深化核能力。

sentences.english: They agreed to enhance solidarity, deepen cooperation and join hands to meet challenges.
sentences.chinese: 各国应加强团结，深化合作，携手应对挑战。

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
